ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Master Yael and Nortlav the Scale Keeper - how do y ou do 'em?
ygData.msgSnippet: Please pick a night and give us a week or so notice. TC and KIA can field some people on most nights. We are having a great time working on everyone s epics so
ygData.messageBody:
Please pick a night and give us a week or so notice. TC and KIA can field
some people on most nights. We are having a great time working on
everyone's epics so I'm pretty confident we can muster some firepower for
you.

I'll be happy to do the organizing on our end. Btw, aren't you down to
just the scales and Trak?

Tzeetch
The Commune representative

--- Daniel Sniderman <fuzzbone@...> wrote:

I'd be up for it - and I want to get our guilds together more - there's
some talk of a formal alliance. Also - I'm sure KIA would be interested as
well.

In general Monday nights are good, some Tuesday and Friday nights, and
most
Saturday and Sunday days.  I'm always busy Wednesday and Thursday
nights...

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: John Grady [mailto:john_grady@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 31, 2001 9:07 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Master Yael and Nortlav the Scale Keeper - how do
y ou do 'em?


Slyde,

So when are we doing him Slyde? Let me know if I or my guild can help.

Tzeetch
Minstrel of Xegony
The Commune

--- Daniel Sniderman <fuzzbone@...> wrote:

According to the backstage board - Nortlav has never dropped anything but
a Red.Occasionally drops two of them. No one has ever confirmed a drop of
a green (at least on that board).Quamper (you didn't sign) have you seen a
green drop?

Slyde
